feels.name: Determination
feels.quote: I can't have it as I like, I don't care to have it at all.

feels.name: Gratitude
feels.quote: If it hadn't been for mother I never should have got through.

feels.name: Disappointment
feels.quote: I can't get any lobsters, so you will have to do without salad today.

feels.name: Disapproval
feels.quote: Why in the world should you spend your money, worry your family, and turn the house upside down for a parcel of girls who don't care a sixpence for you?

feels.name: Reluctance
feels.quote: I would have nothing to do with it at first.

feels.name: Resignation
feels.quote: If your heart is set upon it, and you see your way through without too great an outlay of money, time, and temper, I'll say no more.

Places.name: Home
Places.description: The setting for the preparations and discussions for the event.
